name: part_000
file: tmp_【新曲あり！？】hololive IDOL PROJECTユニット初集合LIVE！ [FWXAnb08CPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening graphics and high-energy instrumental music showcasing the event logo and performing members.
Transition to the stage. Members of the unit ORIO, Tokoyami Towa and Amane Kanata, appear and greet the audience before their performance.
Performance of the song 'Over Time' by the unit ORIO.

subtitles.original: みんなー！ ORIOです！
subtitles.english: Everyone! We are ORIO!

subtitles.original:
Over Time
作詞：やぎぬまかな
作曲・編曲：佐藤カズキ
subtitles.english:
Over Time
Lyrics: Kana Yaginuma
Composition/Arrangement: Kazuki Sato

subtitles.original: 今日が初ライブ！
subtitles.english: Today is our first live!

subtitles.original: その目にしっかり焼き付けてねー！
subtitles.english: Make sure to burn this into your eyes!

subtitles.original: 些細な事　逆らって
subtitles.english: Resisting even the trivial things

subtitles.original: いつの間にか　痛みだしていた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it started to hurt

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないって　分かってるけど
subtitles.english: I know I'm not alone, but

subtitles.original: どうしても孤独に呑まれそう
subtitles.english: I feel like I'm being swallowed by loneliness anyway

subtitles.original: 同じ場所で躓いても
subtitles.english: Even if I stumble in the same place

subtitles.original: 少しずつ進んでいければいいから
subtitles.english: It's okay as long as I can move forward little by little

subtitles.original: 触れられなくてもここには
subtitles.english: Even if I can't touch it, right here

subtitles.original: 確かな光あるんだ
subtitles.english: There is a certain light

subtitles.original: ボクらは　散るまでずっとサバイバー
subtitles.english: We are survivors until the very end

subtitles.original: 道なき道を往く
subtitles.english: Going down a pathless road

subtitles.original: 誰もが　迷える子羊なんだ
subtitles.english: Everyone is a lost lamb

subtitles.original: 聞かせて　小さなことも
subtitles.english: Tell me, even the little things

subtitles.original: ah　完璧じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Ah, even if it's not perfect

subtitles.original: 前を向いたのならきっと繋がっていく
subtitles.english: If you look forward, it will surely connect

subtitles.original: 終わりのない闇の中で
subtitles.english: In the endless darkness

subtitles.original: 俯いては溢れ出す溜息
subtitles.english: A sigh that overflows when I look down

subtitles.original: 出口のないことばかりを
subtitles.english: With nothing but things with no exit

subtitles.original: 考えてまた繰り返して
subtitles.english: I think about them again and again

subtitles.original: うまく伝えられなくても
subtitles.english: Even if I can't convey it well

subtitles.original: 言葉を重ねてみたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to try layering words

subtitles.original: 踏み出す一歩怖くても
subtitles.english: Even if taking the first step is scary

subtitles.original: その先の景色見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see the scenery beyond that

subtitles.original: 天使と悪魔がついてるから
subtitles.english: Because an angel and a devil are with you
